item.title: Context
item.description: The definition, structure and lifecycle-management of software in larger enterprises often builds upon tools and processes, which originate from former on-premise thinking and monolithic architectures.

item.title: Scope
item.description: Operating software products, both for cloud and on-premises, covers many aspects: How, when and where are the technical artifacts created? How are technical artifacts stored and accessed?
